My baby {no longer ours} is now 6.5 months. He's a kicker. I was thinking about naming him Tommy. But since the baby will now have my last name, I like Adan. Adan Purcell. But I still have awhile to think about all that. But he's gonna have it all- the WHOLE world. My little sunshine growing in me is NEVER going to know the pain of not being loved.

Felix... I'm sorry. You left me empty for a long, long time. I thought I found somebody to replace you, but no one will ever take your spot. You let be me be. I still think about you, wonder how you're doing. But I know you would never speak to me again. For awhile, that left me happy. But I still have all the pictures up, the journal we had, the little notes you wrote me, the silly little things you made for me in sculpture. I treasure those more than you know.

As for Juan, I can't get over him, and I promised I'd never give up, but I won't live in fear. And besides, I told him I'd do anything for him, and he asked me to leave. What more could I do? I quit Chick-Fil-A today, cause there's no way I could work with him.

Anyways, my cell number is 683-2089, my mom's number is still the same. FeFe, you can call anytime.

I'm a fat goose now. I feel so damn ugly and fat, and I'm not even huge yet. I love being pregnant with my baby, but I don't like how self-conscious it makes me feel.

I'm so lonely. I want to escape from it all... but there's no one there to comfort me. All I can do is sit and cry for everything that was supposed to be, but will never happen.

Think of me when this you see... FATA<MUDVAYNE<BJORK<JACKOFFJILL<KORN<AFI<SUBLIME<MOMO-Y-FEFE

I love going HOME with the man I love every night, and then making love all night. And having a little boy waiting to come tell me hi and race me up the stairs and to tuck him in. And then take him in the morning to his Amaa's.

Since I've been all mellowed out for the past couple weeks, I've found that life is easier. I can't get worked up about stuff that I normally would.

For instance, yesterday morning I got my bag of clothes and blanket and pillows and told Ray bye. He was like okay? And I kissed him on the forehead and walked out. He just locked the door behind me. {Thanks for acting like you cared.} Then I wrote a note and left it on his truck. It said "Thank you for letting me stay with you and taking me to get my social security card. I get the feeling you don't really want me around, so I'm leaving. I don't know where I'm going, but you know where I work if you want to see me." Guess we'll see if he shows up. I highly doubt he will. He seems to miss Karen {his ex}. Otherwise, he wouldn't have been calling her up right?

It would have made me feel better if he would have at least asked WHY I was leaving. Leaving a note, psssh. Makes it seem even more pathetic.

The point to telling you that, though, is normally I would have stormed in and demanded to know why I wouldn't be the first girl he wanted to hang out with, considering I'm his girlfriend and all. All I can do is say that really blows, and be a little upset at the fact that I thought he was so much more than he really is. But I'm not fuming and yelling at him. 

Wow, the ways I have changed.

and don't it feel GOOD!
